programme.title: Love In 40 Days
programme.desc: Jane gets into a car accident and ends up in Evergreen Mansion, a transitory place in the afterlife. She has to stay there for 40 days while waiting for a potential crossover to heaven. But Evergreen Mansion is in danger of being demolished because of businessman Edward's plans.

programme.title: Maalalaala Mo Kaya

programme.title: Boyong Mañalac, Hoodlum Terminator
programme.desc: After living a life full of vices, women and violence, Boyong Mañalac decided to turn his life around and mend his ways by taking after his father, an upright police officer. Boyong Mañalac personify the ideals of integrity and service to his countrymen.
